okay everybody this is devin and drew here with MBAL(missed by a longshot)new website we r a soon to be band coming soon we have a guitar bass singer drummer everything we r a punk band with lotsa style and spunk not meaning to brag. we like blink 182,simple plan,sum 41,good charlotte ,new found glory,sugarcult, yellow card,green day,mxpx,nofx and pennywise. and other types a music those r our main favorites.we wanna get to know u so if u wanna get to know us or just chat (especially if ur a girl!) e-mail us at urlLink missedbyalongshot@hotmail.com !!! well gots to go and we already have missed by a longshot coprighted so dont try buh-bye! dev & drew
